author: andyc
msg: 1) Added newline normalization to scanLiteral and scanData.
2) Added code to keep track of line/column position in entities.
So now the getLineNumber and getColumnNumber methods of the
Locator interface report the line/column information

author: jeffreyr
msg: add content spec to DTD Grammar

author: andyc
msg: Added newline normalization code to the scanContent method. This
code still needs to be added to scanLiteral and scanData, though.
[Q] Is there any other place where we care about newline
